alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 9:10AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CRAIGHEAD AND NORTHWESTERN POINSETT COUNTIES THROUGH 945 AM CST... At 909 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grubbs, or 10 miles east of Newport, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Harrisburg, Weiner, Waldenburg, Greenfield, Fisher, Pitts, Apt, Valley View, Maple Grove, Gilkerson, Promised Land, Uno, Otwell, Cary, McCormick, Hatchie Coon, Bayou De View State Wildlife Management Area, and Craighead Forest Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
